title: Dr. Vivek Murthy
itunes:title: Dr. Vivek Murthy
description:
Dr. Vivek Murthy, US Surgeon General, talks about the Covid-19 pandemic, vaccines, America's mental health crisis and why more caregivers are needed. He's on "The David Rubenstein Show: Peer-to-Peer Conversations." This was recorded Oct. 26.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
